title: Saiyuuki (Alakazam the Great)
synopsis: Upon a mountain, a monkey is born from stoneâ€”nameless, parentless, and friendless. That is, until one day, he encounters a young female monkey named RinRin, who offers to be his friend. Through RinRin's encouragement, he becomes king after a test of bravery; however, his personality sours. When RinRin tells him that humans are the most intelligent creatures on Earth, the monkey vows to become smarter than them. He leaves RinRin behind and trains with a mountain hermit who gives him the name Son-Goku.
related_anime: ['Boku no Son Gokuu', 'Boku no Son Goku']
staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Director', ' Original Creator']], ['Sugii, Gisaburou', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Okuyama, Reiko', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Hikone, Norio', ['Key Animation']]]
